Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near 63rd/Ashland
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 63rd, Justine, and through Green Line Terminal due to, street blockage near 63rd/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 63rd, Justine, and through Green Line Terminal due to, street blockage near 63rd/Ashland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Western.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
